content.rendered:
Dhanush Tamil Movie

Thiruchitrambalam follows the life of a delivery driver named Jr. Pazham, who lives with his strict father Inspector Neelakandan and grandfather Sr. Pazham. His mother and sister died in an accident, because of his father’s negligence and doesn’t talk with him for 10 years. As Jr. Pazham navigates through his life, he ends up falling for his childhood crush Anusha, but she rejects him because she always saw him as a good friend although she flirted with him. Jr. Pazham reconciles with Neelakandan. Jr. Pazham leave for his mother’s village for a wedding, where he meets Ranjani.

Eventually Ranjani rejects him indirectly, which leaves Jr. Pazham heartbroken. On his way back home, Jr. Pazham talks with Sr. Pazham how unlucky he is in love. Sr. Pazham tells him that he should love Shobhana. Jr. Pazham looks Shobhana in a different way, and starts admiring her. Jr. Pazham asks Shobhana to marry him, but she tells him to forget this. Heartbroken, Jr. Pazham doesn’t talk or meet her daily. Shobhana decides to leave for Canada and tells Pazham to meet her at the airport. On his way to the airport, Jr. Pazham’s vehicle is stopped by the police and Shobhana gets in the flight. Pazham gets depressed about how he missed his chance with Shobhana.

Shobhana’s brother throws all the love letters and gifts collected by Shobhana for Jr. Pazham, where he tells that Shobhana loved Pazham since 6th grade and had proposed just because he had no other option. One month passes by, Pazham calls Shobhana after her departure, where she tells him she hates to leave for Canada and wants to return back to India while Pazham tells her to turn at the back, she is shocked to see him here. Jr. Pazham confess that how much he loves her. They reunite with each other, and get married.

excerpt.rendered: Dhanush Tamil Movie Directed by Mithran R Jawahar Written by Mithran R Jawahar Produced by Kalanithi Maran Starring Dhanush Nithya Menen Raashi Khanna Priya Bhavani
